title: Cowboy Western Music Pack Vol. 2
description: Part 2 of a collection of high-quality spaghetti western music for wild west settings. Contains 34 audio files with strong musical themes evocative of the setting and a variety of moods.
longDescription:
Demo: (1) Cowboy Western Music Pack Vol. 2 Demo - YouTube


This music pack contains 34 audio files of perfect loops, stingers, transitions, and linear songs. There are essentially 4 major moods: Ambient/serious/somber (Ambient Western), Tense/Slow Burn/Rivalry (The Path to Revenge), Fast/Energetic/Steady (Train Jacking), and Epic/Cinematic/Climactic (End of the Line), all containing strong musical themes and leitmotifs that could be used to represent different characters in your game. Each theme is played generally by one or more instrument throughout the music pack (Acoustic Guitar and Chimes, Electric Guitar, Piano, whistle, and mandolin). Each file name specifies track length (in measures) and tempo if applicable making it easier to edit and implement into game engines or audio middleware.

Whether these tracks are used for marketing purposes, cinematics, dialogue, combat, or exploration; they will be a powerful addition to your wild western project.
technicalDetails:
Features:

Ambient Western - Ambient and thematic

  • Ac. Guitar Loop
  • El. Guitar Loop
  • Ac. Guitar, El. Guitar Loop
  • Piano Loop
  • Ac. Guitar, Piano Loop 1
  • Ac. Guitar, Piano Loop 2
  • Whistle Loop
  • Ac. Guitar, Whistle Loop
  • Mandolin, Ac. Guitar Loop
  • End stinger

The Path to Revenge - Slow and Tense

  • Linear
  • Ac. Guitar Loop
  • El. Guitar Loop
  • Piano Loop
  • Ac. Guitar, El. Guitar Loop
  • Ac. Guitar, Piano Loop
  • El. Guitar, Piano Loop
  • El Guitar, Piano Loop 2

Train Jacking - Fast and steady

  • Linear
  • Intro
  • Loop
  • End Stinger

End of the Line - Cinematic and Epic

  • Linear
  • Intro
  • Loop A
  • Transition
  • Loop B
  • End Stinger

Stingers

  • Death Stinger 1
  • Death Stinger 2
  • Achievement Stinger 1
  • Achievement Stinger 2
  • Ambient Ac. Guitar Stinger 1
  • Ambient Ac. Guitar Stinger 2


Number of Audio Wavs: 34

Number of Audio Cues: 34

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz / 16 - bit)

Number of Loops: 19

Minutes of audio provided: Approx. 25 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
